statements: SELECT * FROM policy_management
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder FROM policy_management
SELECT * FROM policy_management WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_holder, expiration_date FROM policy_management WHERE policy_id = 3
SELECT renewal_date, expiration_date FROM policy_management ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_management WHERE renewal_date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, expiration_date FROM policy_management WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%Smith%' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder, renewal_date, expiration_date FROM policy_management WHERE policy_holder = 'Alice' OR policy_holder = 'Bob';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder FROM policy_management WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2023-03-31' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies, MAX(renewal_date) AS latest_renewal_date FROM policy_management WHERE renewal_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, renewal_date FROM policy_renewals WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_expirations WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals WHERE policy_holder = 'Alice';
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations WHERE policy_holder = 'Bob' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations WHERE policy_holder = 'Carol' OR renewal_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM policy_renewal
SELECT policy_number, expiration_date FROM policy_renewal WHERE policy_id = 1
SELECT full_name, email FROM policy_holder ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT policy_id, action, timestamp FROM policy_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT holder_id, phone_number FROM policy_holder WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM policy_renewal WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_renewal WHERE policy_id = 1001;

SELECT policy_holder.full_name, policy_renewal.renewal_date, policy_history.timestamp FROM policy_holder JOIN policy_renewal ON policy_holder.holder_id = policy_renewal.policy_id JOIN policy_history ON policy_renewal.policy_id = policy_history.policy_id WHERE policy_holder.full_name LIKE 'John%';

SELECT policy_holder.full_name, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM policy_holder JOIN policy_renewal ON policy_holder.holder_id = policy_renewal.policy_id JOIN policy_history ON policy_renewal.policy_id = policy_history.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder.full_name HAVING total_actions > 5;

SELECT policy_renewal.policy_number, MAX(policy_history.timestamp) AS latest_action FROM policy_renewal JOIN policy_history ON policy_renewal.policy_id = policy_history.policy_id GROUP BY policy_renewal.policy_number ORDER BY latest_action DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_managers;
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_date FROM policy_managers WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_amount FROM policy_renewals JOIN policy_managers ON policy_renewals.policy_id = policy_managers.policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(history_id) as history_count FROM policy_history GROUP BY policy_id HAVING history_count > 5;
SELECT policy_holder_name FROM policy_managers;
SELECT policy_holder_name, expiration_date FROM policy_managers WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_managers INNER JOIN policy_renewals ON policy_managers.policy_id = policy_renewals.policy_id;
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_amount FROM policy_managers JOIN policy_renewals ON policy_managers.policy_id = policy_renewals.policy_id WHERE renewal_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, event_description FROM policy_managers JOIN policy_history ON policy_managers.policy_id = policy_history.policy_id ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRenewals;
SELECT policy_holder, expiration_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT holder_name, email FROM PolicyHolders ORDER BY holder_name ASC;
SELECT policy_type, premium FROM Policies WHERE premium > 1000 ORDER BY premium DESC;
SELECT agent_name, commission_rate FROM Agents WHERE commission_rate >= 0.05;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder, renewal_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT holder_name, email, phone_number FROM PolicyHolders WHERE holder_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT policy_type, premium FROM Policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT agent_name, commission_rate FROM Agents WHERE commission_rate > 3.00;
